interpretation: The "black nib" card represents the power of communication and self-expression. The nib is the tool that transfers ink onto paper, and just like that, we use language to convey our thoughts and ideas. This card encourages you to express yourself clearly and confidently, whether through writing or speaking. It's a reminder that your words have weight and impact, so choose them wisely. This card can also signify the need to take action and put your ideas into motion. Don't just talk about your plans, but take steps to make them a reality. The "black nib" card urges you to embrace your voice and use it to create positive change.
